alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Franklin; Gulf; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 5:04PM EDT until June 21 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... South central Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southwestern Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Southern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... North central Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 600 PM EDT/500 PM CDT/. * At 504 PM EDT/404 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stonemill Creek, or 15 miles south of Blountstown, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Stonemill Creek, Orange, Wewahitchka, East Camp, Vilas, Chipola Cutoff, Jensen Place, Central City, Red Hill, Scotts Ferry, Poplar Camp, Kern, Nixon Garden, Chipola Park, Twin Pole, Morgan Place, Mcintyre, Yent Place and Owens Bridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
